design_metadata.designer_persona: Senior Level Strategic Cross-Domain Project Designer
design_metadata.strategic_upgrade: Senior Level consolidation with strategic multi-domain integration and risk-first design approach

senior_level_strategic_overview.design_philosophy: Risk-first, compliance-driven, user-centric survey management platform with strategic multi-domain integration

strategic_transformation.efficiency_improvement: 85-90% reduction in survey creation time (from days to hours)
strategic_transformation.compliance_automation: 100% automated compliance validation with zero regulatory breaches target
strategic_transformation.marketing_effectiveness: 40% improvement in campaign ROI measurement with real-time optimization
strategic_transformation.customer_experience: 25% increase in customer response rates with consistent quality

risk_mitigation_approach.security_first: Security and fraud detection integrated from foundation layer
risk_mitigation_approach.compliance_automation: Automated privacy impact assessments and GDPR compliance
risk_mitigation_approach.operational_resilience: Business continuity planning with <4 hour recovery objectives
risk_mitigation_approach.governance_framework: Multi-domain steering committee with clear accountability

competitive_advantages: Industry-leading compliance automation reducing manual overhead by 70%
Real-time campaign ROI measurement enabling marketing optimization within hours vs weeks
Risk-integrated survey deployment preventing security incidents and regulatory breaches
Multi-domain unified platform eliminating system fragmentation and operational silos
Strategic governance model ensuring alignment across business domains

target_architecture.solution_overview: Integrated Survey Management Platform with multi-domain capabilities supporting self-service survey creation, automated compliance validation, comprehensive audit trails, and cross-system integration

admin_frontend.description: React-based admin interface for survey management

embedded_components.description: Iframe-embeddable survey components for client channels

compliance_service.description: Automated compliance validation and approval workflow

risk_management_service.description: Risk assessment and fraud detection integration

event_bus.description: Asynchronous event processing for cross-domain integration

survey_database.description: Primary survey data storage with versioning support

infrastructure.security: Azure AD B2B or AWS Cognito

authentication_authorization.role_based_access: Hierarchical roles mapped to AD groups
authentication_authorization.session_management: Secure token-based sessions with refresh tokens

audit_compliance.audit_logging: Comprehensive activity logging with tamper protection
audit_compliance.change_tracking: Immutable audit trail for all modifications

survey_creation_workflow.description: Streamlined survey template creation with automated validation

compliance_approval_workflow.description: Automated compliance validation with escalation paths

current_vs_target_comparison.current_state: Manual creation using Word/basic tools, 15-25 day cycle
current_vs_target_comparison.target_state: Automated template creation with drag-drop interface, 2-3 day cycle

current_vs_target_comparison.current_state: No survey-specific risk controls, manual monitoring
current_vs_target_comparison.target_state: Integrated fraud detection, automated risk assessment

current_vs_target_comparison.current_state: Manual brand compliance review, inconsistent application
current_vs_target_comparison.target_state: Automated brand guideline enforcement, template standardization
Automated analytics, ROI tracking, campaign integration

transformation_priorities.rationale: Critical for regulatory requirements and business risk
Enables business process automation and efficiency

validation_sessions.success_criteria: Technical feasibility confirmation and security approval

data_domains_affected.retention_requirements: 7 years for banking compliance, delete on request for GDPR

data_flows.destination: Risk management and fraud detection systems

data_flows.data_volume: Medium - Daily batch and real-time sync

compute_resources.application_servers: 4 servers (2 prod, 1 staging, 1 dev) with 8 CPU cores, 16GB RAM each
compute_resources.database_servers: 2 servers (primary/replica) with 16 CPU cores, 32GB RAM, SSD storage

network_requirements.monitoring: Network monitoring for performance and security

storage_requirements.archive_storage: Unlimited cloud storage for long-term retention

criteria.description: Branch managers can create survey templates independently
criteria.specific: 80% of branch managers successfully create templates without IT support
criteria.measurable: Success rate tracked through system analytics
criteria.achievable: Based on user training and intuitive interface design
criteria.relevant: Directly supports customer satisfaction measurement goals

criteria.description: Customer feedback response rates increase significantly
criteria.specific: 25% increase in customer survey response rates
criteria.measurable: Compared to baseline response rates from current manual surveys
criteria.achievable: Through improved survey design and deployment efficiency
criteria.relevant: Critical for NPS and CSAT improvement objectives

criteria.description: Survey compliance approval time dramatically reduced
criteria.specific: Survey approval process completed within 48 hours SLA
criteria.measurable: Average time from submission to approval tracked in system
criteria.achievable: Through automated compliance validation and workflow automation
criteria.relevant: Essential for regulatory compliance and business agility

criteria.specific: 100% of surveys pass compliance validation without regulatory violations
criteria.measurable: Compliance breach incidents tracked and reported
criteria.achievable: Through automated GDPR and privacy controls
criteria.relevant: Critical for regulatory standing and reputation protection

criteria.description: Survey system fraud incidents remain below risk threshold
criteria.specific: Zero fraud incidents above defined risk threshold
criteria.measurable: Fraud incident count and severity tracking
criteria.achievable: Through integrated fraud detection and monitoring systems
criteria.relevant: Essential for capital and reputation protection

criteria.description: Business continuity readiness validated for survey operations
criteria.specific: 99.5% uptime maintained with <2 hour recovery time objective
criteria.measurable: System uptime monitoring and incident response times
criteria.achievable: Through redundant infrastructure and automated failover

criteria.description: Customer acquisition rates improve through survey insights
criteria.measurable: Acquisition metrics compared to pre-implementation baseline
criteria.achievable: Through better customer insights and campaign optimization

criteria.description: Brand consistency maintained across all survey communications
criteria.specific: 100% of surveys comply with brand guidelines
criteria.measurable: Brand compliance validation through automated checks
criteria.achievable: Through template standardization and validation controls
criteria.relevant: Essential for brand protection and customer experience

criteria.specific: 70% reduction in survey deployment time (from 15-25 days to 3-7 days)
criteria.measurable: Time tracking from template creation to live deployment
criteria.achievable: Through process automation and system integration
criteria.relevant: Critical for business agility and time-to-market
criteria.time_bound: Within 3 months of full system implementation

criteria.specific: <2 second response time for all operations, 99.5% uptime
criteria.measurable: Application performance monitoring and uptime tracking
criteria.relevant: Essential for user adoption and business continuity

validation_criteria: Technical architecture approved by enterprise architecture board
Security design approved by information security team
Integration design validated with all affected systems
GDPR compliance assessment completed and approved
Privacy impact assessment approved by legal team
Risk assessment approved by risk management team
quality_gates.success_threshold: All compliance assessments approved without major issues

validation_criteria: 80% user satisfaction rating in UAT sessions
All critical user journeys successfully completed
Performance criteria met in production-like environment
quality_gates.success_threshold: All UAT criteria met with stakeholder sign-off

validation_criteria: Backup and disaster recovery procedures tested
Security monitoring and incident response procedures activated

functional_testing.scope: All survey management workflows and user interfaces
functional_testing.approach: Automated testing for core functions, manual testing for user experience
functional_testing.success_criteria: 95% automated test coverage, 100% critical path validation

performance_testing.scope: Response times, throughput, concurrent user load
performance_testing.approach: Load testing with production-equivalent data volumes
performance_testing.success_criteria: <2 second response time under peak load, 99.5% availability

security_testing.scope: Authentication, authorization, data protection, audit trails
security_testing.approach: Penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, compliance validation
security_testing.success_criteria: Zero high-severity vulnerabilities, compliance validation passed

integration_testing.scope: All external system integrations and data flows
integration_testing.approach: End-to-end testing with production-like system configurations

change_management.change_control_board: Cross-functional team with representation from all domains
change_management.change_approval_process: Risk-based approval with automated low-risk changes
change_management.documentation_requirements: Complete impact assessment for all changes

phase_1_foundation.scope: Core survey management platform with basic compliance

phase_2_integration.scope: External system integrations and advanced compliance

business_kpis: Survey creation cycle time reduction (target: 70% reduction)
User adoption rates (target: 80% for branch managers)
